name: 4 Ingredient Pancake
description: Dive into a healthier lifestyle with these easy-to-make 4 Ingredient Pancakes. Perfect for those following a low-sodium diet, these pancakes are not just nutritious but also cater to your health goals. Enjoy the unique blend of flavors and start your day with a healthified twist!

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the saba bananas and mash them thoroughly in a bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a separate bowl, beat the eggs until they are well mixed.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the mashed saba bananas with the beaten eggs. Stir in the clabber girl (baking powder) until the mixture is well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the virgin coconut oil in a non-stick pan over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Pour 1/4 cup of the pancake mixture into the pan. Cook for about 2-3 minutes on each side or until golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Repeat with the remaining batter. Serve the pancakes hot.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
